definition: فشل fašila a (fašal) to lose courage, be or become cowardly or faint-hearted, lose heart, despair; to be disappointed; to fail, he unsuccessful (في in); to miscarry, go wrong, fail n and IV to thwart, foil, frustrate (هـ s.th.) V to fail, be unsuccessful فشل fašal disappointment, failure, flop, fiasco فشل fašl, fašil weak, faint-hearted, cowardly, craven
